response.overview: Real life based story of the Author whowas young and fell in love on the way when he was travelling in bus fromone town to his village. Due to circumstance they disconnect Again after some time they met when the hero was going to be married with another girl. They surprised to see each other and again they decided to get marry crossing all the limits. At the end they married and became a model Couple.
response.title: O Kudi
